page.title: 08Housing In The Harrowdens.
page.content: There is a great variety of housing in the villages.There are large detached residences, cottages, semi detached residences, terraced houses,bungalows and Â£estate type' houses. The majority of the houses are privately owned but there are some council rented houses built since 1945. In addition there are some old peoples sheltered houses with a warden in charge. Not only does the age and type of housing vary but also the type of building materials used.The older detached residences and several of the cottages are built out of the Northamptonshire Iron Stone.Some of the cottages have been built out of a mixture of stone and brick and then rendered on the outside.
